title: Gray Street
description: Andrea Marzsalek is on the brink of success but in the blink of an eye, her entire life is in shambles. She must learn how to piece her life back together bit by bit. Her parents have passed away, leaving her feeling incredibly alone. Not to mention that her sister is missing and has been a drug addict on the streets for years. By happenstance, she runs into her college boyfriend and he wants her to move to the city with him. In a moment of frenzy, she decides to leave it all behind for a few weeks to go on a mission trip in South America. Will she be able to overcome her insecurities and fears so that she can live the life sheâ€™s always wanted or will her grief, time in South America, and missing sister drive her into madness?
author: Annie Wood
